definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: It is a practical need applying linear conversion in digitized chart-making.
sentences.chinese: 線性變換應用於數字化儀制圖，是一種實際需要。

sentences.english: This article introduces the design and implementation of Mapping Information System for Field Archaeology.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了田野考古制圖信息系統的設計思路和實現過程。
